content: this legal text summarizes a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the case involved the distribution of assets worth 43000 eur between two heirs the widow and the son of the deceased the widow will receive the majority of the assets including real estate funds and movable property while the son will receive a real estate apartment the court based its decision on the principles of the inheritance act the court also determined that the deceaseds daughter is entitled to half of the estate and held a succession hearing where the heirs reached an agreement on how to distribute the estate the court approved the inheritance agreement and determined the value of the estate to be 318000 eur the heirs will need to pay a court fee of 1080 eur the text also explains the process of filing an appeal in a legal case including the requirements for the notice of appeal and the payment of a court fee

metadata.cost: 1.080,00 EUR court fees and 318'000.00 inheritance value
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, company shares, vintage vehicles, firearms, debt under a credit agreement
